meanings.definition: Arranged in a bundle or cluster.
meanings.sent1: The fascicled flowers on the plant looked beautiful together.
meanings.sent2: The fascicled branches of the tree made it easier to distinguish from others.
meanings.sent3: The fascicled leaves seemed to be gossiping with each other in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The fascicled wires in the computer were like a tightly knit family, working in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The fascicled arrangement of books on the shelf made it easy to find the one she wanted.

meanings.sent1: The fascicled roots of the plant helped it stay firmly in the ground.
meanings.sent2: The fascicled structure of the muscle fibers allowed for efficient movement.
meanings.sent3: The fascicled hair strands clung together like best friends on a windy day.
meanings.sent4: The fascicled wires in the circuit board resembled a tightly knit community.
meanings.sent5: The fascicled arrangement of pencils on the desk made them easy to grab quickly.
